title: Champion select crash  *PLZ HELP*
body:
When i join a champ select i found no champs to select or masteries pages.. i cant even pick anything  i wait till it aoutomaticly close the champ select .. i restart game more than 5 times and same problem everytime
please help..

replies.body: When you enter the game lobby you need to make a new connection to that game as well as the other players. If your network is having a hard time making those connections there's a good chance of you being dropped from the lobby altogether. Let's go through and update some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but let me know if that doesn't help very much!

|||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||[Re-establish efficient network communications with the League severs.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)|
|-

||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||https://puu.sh/w6V29/dc98f0c6a9.jpg|
|-

---

|||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||Freezing or crashing in champ select is usually the result of an unstable connection to the servers.|
|-
 

|||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||Champ Select in all modes requires a more steady connection than the lobby as picks (and bans for Draft) are processed in real-time. This is why it's more vulnerable to disconnect there.|
|-
